title: A match without a chat...
body: I think that lol should make a match that has the chat disabled for the Muslim players that want to play lol during Ramadan because if they hear/read a swear word their fasting will not count.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there is no way to completely disable chat :(

I would recommend that once you load into the game, you can immediately take the chat window and drag it behind the HUD so you aren't able to see the text in-game.  However, there is no way to hide the chat either in Champion Select, or in the end-of-game stats screen.

I hope this helps!

There is also manually editing the config file to shrink it down to nothing (or close enough). I think -150 does it (has to be done in both the game.cfg and persistedsettings.json).

I don't know if you can suggest it as a Rioter, so I will :3
